name: Tantalus (cornfab)
description:
TANTALUS

Child of distraction, pry thine attention from screens aglow, and commit thine regard to Time passing in her holy slowness.

Conceit

Defeat the Apple Boss and clear the Apple Dungeon.

Made in 5 days for VimJam2 (Boss) and Decade Jam; Thanks for spending all this time with me

Controls
  • WASD/Arrow Keys: move
  • E/Space: interact
  • Enter/Return: submit
  • Esc/Q: exit menu/minigame
  • N: Toggle SFX
  • M: Toggle Music
Addl Credits

Palette: quested mountain by polyphorge
